pli-tv-bu-vb-pd2:1.1: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā rājagahe viharati veḷuvane kalandakanivāpe.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pd2:1.2: Tena kho pana samayena bhikkhū kulesu nimantitā bhuñjanti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pd2:1.3: Chabbaggiyā bhikkhuniyo chabbaggiyānaṁ bhikkhūnaṁ vosāsantiyo ṭhitā honti—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pd2:1.7: Ye te bhikkhū appicchā …pe… te ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pd2:1.8: “kathañhi nāma chabbaggiyā bhikkhū bhikkhuniyo vosāsantiyo na nivāressantī”ti …pe…
pli-tv-bu-vb-pd2:1.9: “saccaṁ kira tumhe, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo vosāsantiyo na nivārethā”ti?
pli-tv-bu-vb-pd2:1.12: kathañhi nāma tumhe, moghapurisā, bhikkhuniyo vosāsantiyo na nivāressatha.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pd2:1.14: evañca pana, bhikkhave, imaṁ sikkhāpadaṁ uddiseyyātha—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pd2:1.15.1: “Bhikkhū paneva kulesu nimantitā bhuñjanti, tatra ce sā bhikkhunī vosāsamānarūpā ṭhitā hoti—‘idha sūpaṁ detha, idha odanaṁ dethā’ti, tehi bhikkhūhi sā bhikkhunī apasādetabbā— ‘apasakka tāva, bhagini, yāva bhikkhū bhuñjantī’ti. Ekassa cepi bhikkhuno na paṭibhāseyya taṁ bhikkhuniṁ apasādetuṁ— ‘apasakka tāva, bhagini, yāva bhikkhū bhuñjantī’ti paṭidesetabbaṁ tehi bhikkhūhi—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pd2:1.16: ‘gārayhaṁ, āvuso, dhammaṁ āpajjimhā asappāyaṁ pāṭidesanīyaṁ, taṁ paṭidesemā’”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pd2:2.1.2: kulaṁ nāma cattāri kulāni— khattiyakulaṁ, brāhmaṇakulaṁ, vessakulaṁ, suddakulaṁ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pd2:2.1.4: pañcannaṁ bhojanānaṁ aññatarena bhojanena nimantitā bhuñjanti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pd2:2.1.8: yathāmittatā yathāsandiṭṭhatā yathāsambhattatā yathāsamānupajjhāyakatā yathāsamānācariyakatā— “idha sūpaṁ detha, idha odanaṁ dethā”ti. Esā vosāsantī nāma.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pd2:2.1.13: Tehi bhikkhūhi sā bhikkhunī apasādetabbā— “apasakka tāva, bhagini, yāva bhikkhū bhuñjantī”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pd2:2.1.14: Ekassa cepi bhikkhuno anapasādito— “khādissāmi bhuñjissāmī”ti paṭiggaṇhāti, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pd2:2.2.1: Upasampannāya upasampannasaññī vosāsantiyā na nivāreti, āpatti pāṭidesanīyassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pd2:2.2.2: Upasampannāya vematiko vosāsantiyā na nivāreti, āpatti pāṭidesanīyassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pd2:2.2.3: Upasampannāya anupasampannasaññī vosāsantiyā na nivāreti, āpatti pāṭidesanīyassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pd2:2.2.4: Ekatoupasampannāya vosāsantiyā na nivāreti, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
